ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Abashi finally responds... sort of
ygData.msgSnippet: Ugh. Well obviously if you can t convince them with cold, hard statistics then I guess that would encourage ranting. If you have a copy of his post (or a url
ygData.messageBody:
Ugh. Well obviously if you can't convince them with cold, hard statistics
then I guess that would encourage ranting.

If you have a copy of his post (or a url to it) I'd appreciate reading what
he said. Sounds like bad news to me though.

Windleaf

At 09:31 PM 10/11/00 +0000, you wrote:
>I think you misinterpreted Kaearia (John Kim's) position. He stated he
>did not think Verant was maliciously screwing over bards. Instead, he
>thinks that they are a bunch of idiots who have no idea what they are
>doing in regards to bards. So he is no longer going to worry about trying
>to use logic, statistical analysis, etc. to fight for improvements to the
>bard class since they don't have a clue what they are doing. Thats the
>way I interpreted his post.
>
>Galtin of E'ci
>
